items.sentence: It must\'ve been the day before Tom got here that I got up before dawn.
It\'ll be easier for me to do since I have the right tools for the job.
When Tom gets drunk, he\'ll eat a lot of things that he shouldn\'t eat.
I didn\'t know French the last time I met you, but now I know a little.
I know you didn\'t want Tom to wear your clothes, but his were all wet.
I wonder whether or not Tom has told Mary she doesn\'t have to do that.
I\'ll never forget how nice Tom was to me when I first moved to Boston.
I know that you can play the clarinet. Can you play the saxophone, too?
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will ever face criminal charges.
Tom couldn\'t relax at home with his children running around the house.
